Package thothbot.parallax.core.shared.core

Contains all core Objects such as Vectors, Matrices and so on which are used overall on the project.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Geometric  
    Vector
    Interface of the vector.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoundingBox
    Bounding Box is a container which used for quickly and easily determination of the location of an object in space.
    BoundingSphere
    Bounding SphereGeometry is a container which used for quickly and easily determination of the location of an object in space.
    Color
    The Color class is used encapsulate colors in the default RGB color space.
    ExtrudeGeometry
    Creates extruded geometry from a path shape.
    ExtrudeGeometry.ExtrudeGeometryParameters  
    ExtrudeGeometry.WorldUVGenerator  
    Face3
    Face3 represent the triangular sides (A, B, C) of the geometric object.
    Face4
    Face4 represent the rectangular sides (A, B, C, D) of the geometric object.
    FastMap<V>  
    Frustum
    This class implements three-dimensional region which is visible on the screen.
    Geometry
    Base class for geometries Geometry geometry = new Geometry(); geometry.getVertices().add( new Vector3( -10, 10, 0 ) ); geometry.getVertices().add( new Vector3( -10, -10, 0 ) ); geometry.getVertices().add( new Vector3( 10, -10, 0 ) ); geometry.getFaces().add( new Face3( 0, 1, 2 ) ); geometry.computeBoundingSphere();
    GeometryBuffer  
    GeometryBuffer.Offset  
    GeometryGroup  
    Gyroscope  
    JsArrayUtil
    Helper class for converting from Java arrays to JavaScript arrays ( JsArrayNumber and JsArrayInteger).
    Mathematics
    Class implements some mathematical helpers methods.
    Matrix3
    This class implements three-dimensional matrix.
    Matrix4
    This class implements three-dimensional matrix.
    Projector
    Projects points between spaces.
    Quaternion
    Implementation of Quaternion which provide a convenient mathematical notation for representing orientations and rotations of objects in three dimensions.
    Ray
    Representation of a ray in space.
    UV
    Class implements UV texture mapping.
    Vector2
    This class is realization of (X, Y) vector.
    Vector3
    This class is realization of (X, Y, Z) vector.
    Vector4
    This class is realization of (X, Y, Z, W) vector.

Package thothbot.parallax.core.shared.core Description

Contains all core Objects such as Vectors, Matrices and so on which are used overall on the project.
